French: Je ne crois pas aux extra-terrestres.

English: I thought i'd find you here.
French: Je pensais que je vous {{c::trouverais}} ici.

English: Come out from under the table!
I like summer better than winter.

French: Je le rapporterai à ma maman !
Je le rapporterai à ma maman !

English: I don't speak any other languages.
I want to live in the {{c::countryside}}.
French: Je veux vivre à la campagne.

English: I'm beginning to get the idea.

French: Je suis le capitaine de ce bateau.

English: I'm the captain of this ship.
French: Je suis le {{c::capitaine}} de ce bateau.

English: It's kind of a bad time.

French: Je savais que je vous {{c::trouverais}} ici.

English: You won't find it in there.
I don't know how to describe it.
Do you think i want to die?

French: Ça ressemble à de la soie.

English: I will not do it again.
